    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CollectionConverter
    Static class.
    CollectionPrinter
    Prints prompts and Arrays.toString values of arrays to an encapsulated PrintStream.
    ConsoleHandler
    Handles user IO operations through an encapsulated PrintStream and Scanner.
    ErrorPresenter
    Defines a contract for displaying error information to actors.
    InputHandler
    Provides an interface to use Inputter-implementing objects.
    InvalidStringInputException
    Exception thrown when a user submits invalid string input.
    JOptionPaneHandler
    Handles user IO operations through JOptionPane panes.
    NumberInputter
    Defines a contract for numeric input from actors.
    StringInputter
    Defines a contract for string input from actors.
    StringUtils
    Static class.
    YesNoInput
    Represents a normalized binary input for yes/no decisions.
    YesNoInputter
    Defines a contract for YesNoInput from actors.
